wrangling_procedure: Download .maf file from TCGA DCC, processed into gene by sample matrix at UCSC, stored in the UCSC Xena repository
dataProducer: Genome Institute at Washington University Sequencing Center
label: BRCA gene-level mutation (wustl curated)
gdata_tags: Genome Institute at Washington University Sequencing Center
description:
TCGA breast invasive carcinoma (BRCA) somatic mutation data. Sequencing data are generated on a IlluminaGA system. The calls are generated at Genome Institute at Washington University Sequencing Center using the WashU pipeline method.

Red (=1) indicates that a non-silent somatic mutation (nonsense, missense, frame-shif indels, splice site mutations, stop codon readthroughs, change of start codon, inframe indels) was identified in the protein coding region of a gene, or any mutation identified in a non-coding gene. White (=0) indicates that none of the above mutation calls were made in this gene for the specific sample.
longTitle: TCGA breast invasive carcinoma (BRCA) gene-level nonsilent somatic mutation (wustl curated)
name: TCGA_BRCA_mutation_curated_wustl_gene
